label: LocationParty
comment: An individual, a group, or a body having a role related to a location.

datatypeProperties.comment: A unique country identifier for this location party.
A code specifying a role of this location party.

objectProperties.comment: An individual human being in a position to give assistance or information.
The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.
The location at which a particular trade related organization or person may be found or reached.
A service associated with a transport movement.,A referenced service associated with a specified event during transport movement.
A transport related person specified for this location party.
The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.
The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.

referencedBy.comment: A servicing party specified for this logistics related location.
